Package org.javasimon.console.text

Machinery to convert potentially anything to a String (said differently a configurable toString() API).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Stringifier<T> Value formatter for given type.
 

Class Summary
BaseStringifier<T> Basic value formatter.
CompositeStringifier Dictionary (Class type,String subType)→Stringifier.
NoneStringifier<T> Stringifier with particular meaning: do not stringify this value.
StringifierFactory Base helper class to format values of attributes of simons.
StringifierFactory.DateStringifier Stringifier implementation for Date type.
StringifierFactory.DoubleTimeStringifier Stringifier implementation for Double type reprensenting a duration.
StringifierFactory.LongDateStringifier Stringifier implementation for Long type reprensenting a timestamp.
StringifierFactory.LongTimeStringifier Stringifier implementation for Long type reprensenting a duration.
StringifierFactory.NumberStringifier<T extends Number> Stringifier implementation for Number type.
 

Package org.javasimon.console.text Description

Machinery to convert potentially anything to a String (said differently a configurable toString() API). The CompositeStringifier is a dictionnary which registers a Stringifier implementation for each Java type (String, Long,etc). A given Java type can:

  • Have different meanings (a long can be a duration, a timestamp, a counter, etc): the "sub-type" concept was introduced.
  • Be styled differently (HTML, CSV, XML, JSON, etc): a dictionnary factory was introduced StringifierFactory and its subclasses CsvStringifierFactory, JsonStringifierFactory, etc.
